Episode.GuestStars: |Chase Coleman|Eka Darville|Elyse Levesque|Matt Kabus|Nathan Parsons|Shannon Eubanks|Steven Krueger|Tasha Ames|Todd Stashwick|
Episode.Overview: Desperate to help Kieran, Cami insists on an unconventional treatment, but her good intentions lead Kieran to a violent episode. After Klaus and Elijah disagree over the best way to handle the Crescent Wolves, Elijah makes a trip to the bayou, where he is witness to a horrific explosion that only adds to the hatred and mistrust among the communities. While Jackson and Elijah work to save the wounded, Hayley learns a surprising piece of her family history from Marcel.
